name: 2020 International Symposium on Automation, Information and Computing
content: Important Dates First Round Submission Deadline: August 15, 2020 Final Submission Deadline for Full Paper/Abstract: October 15, 2020 Early Registration Deadline: November 1, 2020 Program Schedule： December 2nd, 2020 Registration December 3rd, 2020 Keynote Speech, Invited & Oral Presentation December 4th, 2020 Poster Presentation Topics of interest for submission include, but are not limited to: Artificial Intelligence Networked Control Systems Engineering Computer Architecture Wireless Sensor Networks MEMS and Micro Devices Modelling and Simulation Supply Chain and Logistics Human Computer Interaction Robust and Adaptive Control Metrology and System Reliability Communications and Networks Information and Network Security Intelligent Machine Interface Design Big Data and Knowledge Engineering Machine Vision and Image Processing Robot Control and Intelligent sensors Computer Graphics and Visualization Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality Power, Energy and Industry Application Control Methodologies and Applications Software Testing and Reuse Applications Optimisation and Decision Making Support Information Technology and Cloud Computing Non-destructive Testing and Condition Monitoring Process Modelling, Control and Optimal Design works Multimedia Systems and System Diagnosis and Identification Digital Manufacturing and Enterprise Technologies Applications Flexible Manufacturing and Computer-integrated Manufacturing Autonomous Systems and Security Making Support Sensor Integration Neural Networks, Fuzzy Logic, Genetic Algorithms and Machine Learning Submission 1\. Conference Proceedings (EI & Scopus indexed) Accepted full papers of ISAIC 2020 will be published in Journal of Physics: Conference Series (JPCS), and submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus and Inspec for indexing. 2\. SCI/ISI journals Excellent papers will be recommended or directly published in related SCI/ISI journals with impact factor. Contact Information Email： isaic@confiswee.com / isaicinfo@163.com Conference Website：https://huali95.github.io/#/
